ygData.subject: Re: Anti-Camping ?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard of people camping for the jboot for 6hours a day for over a week b4 they got one. The FBR is easy compaired to the boots. Najena almost always
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard of people camping for the jboot for 6hours a day for over a week
b4 they got one. The FBR is easy compaired to the boots. Najena almost always
spawns with it. However she doent alwasy spawn. Sometimes a Elmental spawns
in her place, and no there is no such thing as Anticamping code. When me and
My group whent for the robes we tested it out. She spawned just as many times
when we were on the other side of the water as she did when we were camping
at her doorstep. That anicamping is a legioned not based on facts. Caused
because some Npc's dont always spawn in fact they spawn randomly. so people
started camping on the other side and poof she disided to show up that
time... and thus the legioned was born.
